Key Match Events: The New Orleans Pelicans lost to the Los Angeles Clippers 116-113 on December 30, 2024.
Dejounte Murray had one of his best games in a New Orleans uniform with 13 points, 10 rebounds, eight assists, and six steals.
Post-Match Reflections: Dejounte Murray addressed the media postgame, stating, 'No excuses. A lot of things going on. Still trying to get healthy, dealing with little things, but at the end of the day I'm not that guy that's going to come to media when we lose, 'Oh I'm hurt and dealing with this or that'. That's the cop-out way.'
Others: The Pelicans have lost 10 straight games and all five games on their home stand.
New Orleans is without key players Zion Williamson, Brandon Ingram, and Jose Alvarado due to injuries.
